short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetch specification content from a Notion page and generate shell commands using the OpenAI API.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fetch the technical specification from a Notion page and generate shell commands to create the code. 
It creates all the files and fill them with code related to the specifications.
It uses ChatGPT and the OpenAI API to generate the code.
